body_html:
tf.constant is intended to produce values that are fully known at graph construction time. Perhaps I'm misunderstanding, but what does a "constant with dynamic shape" mean?

Perhaps what you're looking for is tf.fill?
body_text:
tf.constant is intended to produce values that are fully known at graph construction time. Perhaps I'm misunderstanding, but what does a "constant with dynamic shape" mean?
Perhaps what you're looking for is tf.fill?
body:
`tf.constant` is intended to produce values that are fully known at graph construction time. Perhaps I'm misunderstanding, but what does a "constant with dynamic shape" mean?

Perhaps what you're looking for is [`tf.fill`](https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/fill)?
